Title: Relates to requiring the use of electronic coupling when providing prearranged transportation services to passengers
Summary: Requires the use of electronic coupling when providing prearranged transportation services to allow a passenger to confirm the prearranged match through an interactive exchange of signals on both the driver's handheld device and the passenger's handheld device.
LawCode: Add ยง1229-e, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring the use of electronic coupling when providing prearranged transportation services to passengers
